summary: Six unique female companions to aid you in your adventures, and keep you warm at night. Destiny Followers have a UNPB body and are 100% completely standalone. All or essential and marriageable.
descriptionHtml:
[size=36]Destiny Followers[/size]
[size=4][b]Description[/b][/size]
This mod adds six new unique and 100% completely standalone companions to your game. All are essential and marriageable and have Sevenbase bodies.

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/43225-2-1380728223.jpg[/img]

[size=4][b]Details[/b][/size]
Lex - a Breton Assassin (1H Melee) who resides in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
Pandora - a Breton Mage (Sorcerer) residing in the Frozen Hearth in Winterhold.
Kayla - a Nord Warrior (2H Melee) hangs out in he Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.
Scarlet - a Wood Elf Ranger (Ranged) sells her wares in the Dead Man's Drink in Falkreath
Alicia - a Dark Elf Spellsword (Magic/Melee) who awaits adventure in the Sleeping Giant Inn at Riverwood
Akasha - a Redgaurd Warrior (1H Melee) who seeks adventure at the Sleeping Giant Inn at Riverwood


[size=4][b]Install[/b][/size]
I would strongly recommend using NMM to install any mod including this one as it will be much easier to uninstall it if you don't like it.

Manual Installation
- = or = -
NMM Installation

[b][I]Manual Install[/b][/I]
1. Extract this archive to any folder and then copy the contents to Skyrim's Data folder.
2. Start Skyrim Launcher and enable the DestinyFollowers.esp file.

[size=4][b]Uninstall[/b][/size]
Pick which method you are going to use for uninstall based on how you installed it:

Manual Uninstall
- = or = -
NMM Uninstall

[b][I]Manual Uninstall[/b][/I]
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

[size=4][b]Incompatibility[/B][/size]
I'm not aware of any issues at this time but please let me know if you encounter any.

[size=4][b]Known Issues or Bugs[/B][/size]
None as yet - but I'm sure they'll come at some point!

[size=4][b]History[/B][/size]
1.0, 2013/09/30 - Initial release.

[size=4][b]Contact[/b][/size]
You can find me on Skyrim Nexus as 'Gordy2020'

[size=4][b]Credits[/b][/size]
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim. A truly awesome game!

Used in the creation of this mod and with permission:
Thanks to Apachii for Apachii Sky hair.

I use hundreds of mods blended to make the perfect companions for me and my friends. I will endeavour to list originating authors of mods I've used here as I have no doubt missed many of them. If you spot work that belongs to you and I haven't credited you then it is a genuine omission and I will rectify as soon as you let me know. Thanks for your understanding.

[size=4][b]Tools Used[/b][/size]
Skyrim Creation Kit
GIMP + NVidia DDS Plugin
NIFSkope
7-Zip

[size=4][b]Licensing/Legal[/b][/size]
All I ask is that you let me know if you intend to alter/modify this mod in any way. However, full credit for skins, eyes, hair and body goes to the originating source mods authors without which the companions just wouldn't be the same at all. Much Kudos to them.
author: Gordy2020
